metadata.name: Analyze API Consistency with Code-Mapper
metadata.shortDescription: Analyze API naming, parameter, and return-pattern consistency using code-mapper full foundation outputs.
metadata.description: Workflow skill that runs full code-mapper foundation analysis on a target repository, extracts public API signatures from the code-map output, and generates a structured API consistency report for selected modules or packages.
objectives: Run full code-mapper foundation analysis to obtain complete API signatures
Analyze naming, parameter, and return-pattern consistency across modules
Generate a structured API consistency report aligned with project conventions
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

technical_requirements.recommended_llm: Same class of models validated for core OLAF skills
technical_requirements.tool_dependency: Python runtime capable of executing scripts/code-mapper/run.py and related utilities.
technical_requirements.platform_limitations: Assumes access to the target repository filesystem and ability to run Python scripts.

prompts.name: analyze-api-consistency
prompts.description: Main workflow prompt that orchestrates code-mapper full foundation analysis and API consistency reporting.
